snippet: PERLMAN--Claire. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Claire Perlman. Claire's compassion and dedication helped to improve countless lives. Her devotion to Jewish philanthropy will live on in the continuing efforts of her loving family not only in New York but also throughout the United States, in Israel and around the world. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Claire's beloved children John (Maxine), Toni and Jim; her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
